content: raspberry orange knit english version my first cable scarf 1 materials knit by moltrup pure merino 50g/175m held together with knit by moltrup kid silk 25g/210m you will need one skein in each yarn quality knit with one strand of each quality held together you can also use pure merino alone or substitute the silk mohair with e g filcolana saga or isager alpaca 1 yarn alternative filcolana pernilla 50g/175m held together with filcolana tilia 25g/210m you will need one skein of each suggested needles 4 5 mm us 7 + 4 5 mm us 7 cable needle or a double-pointed needle measurements length 96 cm 37 75 inches width 8 5 cm 3 34 inches edge stiches est work edge stitches using the distitch selvedge by assia brill method have a look here for how to work distitch increases increases are only worked on right side rs row m1r right-leaning increase with the left needle lift the thread between the needles from back to front and knit m1l left-leaning increase with your left needle lift the thread between the needles from front to back and knit through the back loop m1rp with your left needle lift the thread between the needles from front to back and purl through the back loop m1lp with your left needle lift up the thread between the needles from back to front and purl decrease decreases are only worked on right side rs row both knit and purl decreases are used k2tog right-leaning decrease knit two stitches together though front loop skp left-leaning decrease slip one stitch knitwise knit one stitch pass slipped stitch over p2tog right-leaning decrease purl two stitches together spp left-leaning decrease purl one stitch purlwise purl one stitch pass slipped stitch over 2 cables to twist noted simply as twist in the pattern cables are worked only on right side rs row every 8th row each cable is worked over 4 knit stitches and leans to the right cable 4 back c4b slip the first two stitches onto a cable needle hold them in the back knit the next two stitches then knit the two stitches from the cable needle have a look here for how to work cable 4 back abbreviations co cast on k knit p purl rs right side ws wrong side est edge stitches 3 begin
